entry.string: Xaraya is currently in the beta development phase
entry.translation: Xereya is coorrently in zee beta defelupment phese

entry.string: If you notice any unexpected functionality, please use our bug tracker at
entry.translation: Iff yuoo nuteece-a uny unexpected fooncshuneleety, pleese-a use-a oooor boog trecker et

entry.string: Thank you for your support, and feel free to join our development or user discussions to become involved in our community.
entry.translation: Thunk yuoo fur yuoor sooppurt, und feel free-a tu jueen oooor defelupment oor user deescoossiuns tu becume-a infulfed in oooor cummooneety. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: For more information on Xaraya, please visit
entry.translation: Fur mure-a inffurmeshun oon Xereya, pleese-a feesit

entry.string: P.S. Messages on this page are made out of static templates. However, they can be edited in the overridden template file for the base module; the template is located on this path:
entry.translation: P.S. Messeges oon thees pege-a ere-a mede-a oooot ooff steteec templetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Hooefer, zeey cun be-a ideeted in zee ooferreeddee templete-a feele-a fur zee bese-a mudoole-a; zee templete-a is luceted oon thees pet:
